items.title: Implement AI Recommendation Engine
items.description: Develop and integrate an AI-based recommendation system to suggest relevant products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System generates at least 5 personalized product recommendations per user session
Recommendations update in real-time based on user interactions
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing
non_functional: System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users
Ensure GDPR compliance for user data

notes: User input was high-level; assumed core requirement is to build a personalized recommendation engine for an e-commerce platform. Specifics like algorithms and UI placement are not provided.
